resources.string:
Hello User! 

The Weather App lets you search for weather Details of a particular location.
You can set the location by clicking on the AutocompleteWidget provided by Google.
On selecting the location, the weather details of that particular location can be viewed below it.
The button at the bottom of the screen "Click here for next 5 days Forecast" can be clicked for viewing the weather forecast data of the next 5 days, from today.
The data, which is extracted is stored in an SQLite database, which can be viewed later on clicking the floating action button at the bottom right side of the screen.

Enjoy the app!

Developed by,
Rajat Bhatta
106116066.

Thank you

The page contains all the recently searched places in the form of a list of cities searched and the corresponding times at which the searches were made.

The linked weather information can be viewed by clicking on the corresponding item.
